dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Adoreanjali u
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Anjali [mailto:anjalikara@adoreanjali.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 11, 2006 5:38 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: DMCA Complaint from Adoreanjali u

Hi

Your customer desitorrents who host on your servers are yet again posting
copyrighted material of mine. Can you please remove this as soon as
possible. All DMCA details can be found in this email.

http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/showthread.php?t=87044&highlight=anjali

Can you also please tell me what it takes for these guys to be booted from
your service as they continue to break your terms and conditions.

Regards

Anjali Kara


----- Original Message -----
From: <legal-response@theplanet.com>
To: <anjalikara@adoreanjali.com>; <legalresponse2@theplanet.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 29, 2005 8:22 PM
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Adoreanjali u


> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your 
> below-pasted complaint has been disabled.
>
> Legal Response Team
> The Planet
>
>
>
> ---------
>
>
> From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 22, 2005 12:08 PM
> To: anjalikara@adoreanjali.com; copyright@theplanet.com
> Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint from Adoreanjali.com]
>
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
>
> Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at 
> the address of copyright@theplanet.com.
>
> - -------- Original Message --------
> Subject: [ABUSE] DMCA Complaint from Adoreanjali.com
> Date: Tue, 21 Jun 2005 13:10:23 +0100
> From: Anjali <anjalikara@adoreanjali.com>
> To: <copyright@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>
>
> NOTICE of COPYRIGHT/TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT
>
> Complainant Name : Anjali Kara
> Address : PO BOX 37915
> city: London
> Country: United Kingdom
> Phone : +44 (0)115 8461558
>
> This notice is served on:
>
> http://www.desitorrents.com
>
> Date: June 21st 2005
>
> This copyrighted material is currently being infringed at the following 
> URL's and/or the infringing activity is found at the following URL's:
>
> http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/showthread.php?t=47502
> All content is owned by myeself as the operator of www.adoreanjali.com
>
> I request that the foregoing material and/or activity be removed or access

> to it disabled:
>
> I have contacted the moderator/operator of this site several times and 
> have had no reply. I have also tried to contact other listed moderators to

> get my content removed from the site with no joy. Since this cannot be 
> solved amicably, they have left me in option but to email yourselves as 
> you are listed as the hosting company for desitorrents.com
>
> This guy hides behind whoisguard and believes he can run an illegal site 
> by hiding behind a tenuous dislcaimer:
>
> http://www.desitorrents.com/forums/disclaimer.php
>
> I also believe he is breaking your AUP by running Bit Torrent. His site is

> rife with copyrighted material and is blatently breaking the law. He makes

> no action to moderate his board.
>
>
>
> THIS NOTICE IS PER THE DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT of 1998
>
> As the owner of the exclusive right to the copyrighted material at issue 
> in this notice, I hereby state that use of the material in the manner 
> complained of is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or the 
> law. I hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United

> States, that the information in this notification is accurate, and under 
> penalty of perjury, that as the complaining party and owner of an 
> exclusive right that is being infringed as set out in this notification
>
>
> Anjali Kara
>
>
> - --
> Thanks,
> Policy Enforcement
> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
> http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
> Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
> Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
>
> iD8DBQFCuZrZvK/XpJs6oyURAvt8AJ94zdvGoS6DJ7XFLLb8GFjAOnGBoQCgj2Tl
> 9rD+OyK3eZl1y2VSVkfs1S8=
> =OfTY
> -----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
>
